blog.name: artofthrones
blog.title: The Art of Ice and Fire
blog.description:
Game of Thrones/A Song of Ice and Fire Art Blog, None of these are original works.  If you re-blog from here, keep the artist's credits within your re-blog! Background and Avatar by the excellent Prokrik.

Spoilers in some pictures! Be wary, I'm not responsible for your discoveries!

Use the home link, or the orange top right X to navigate back home. 

Use the search or the image tags to find your favorite houses/characters. "HLS4" for histories and lore of season 4.

summary: HBO is really about to have Jon and Sansa reunite AFTER Arya and Bran! They’re really about to give us not one but TWO emotional...
body: HBO is really about to have Jon and Sansa reunite AFTER Arya and Bran! They’re really about to give us not one but TWO emotional Jon and Sansa reunions in front of EVERYBODY!!! I know it’s been a few days but I’m dead ass still shook because that’s the last thing I was expecting. Season 8 let’s fucking go!!!

summary:
No-one 
Chapter 6: The truth
title:
No-one 
Chapter 6: The truth
body:
AO3: https://archiveofourown.org/works/15243495/chapters/35355981

Story summary:

Set after Season 8 of GOT. Jon Snow dies whilst killing the Night King leaving Daenerys and their unborn child without him. Picks up five years after the battle for the dawn, No-one struggles to control his emotion and keep away from the people he loved most. Daenerys tries to cope without Jon in her and their daughter’s life. Someone has given a name to the Many faced gods forcing No-one to go home and face his family, whilst trying to forget his old life and the person he used to be. Jon Snow. This will only be about 7 chapters long and be specifically focused around Jonerys.

Chapter summary: She’s awake and knows the truth

summary:
F     A     S     T     E     R (x) by the “Manic Street Preachers”  

Sleep cannot hide thoughts splitting through my mind,...
caption:
F     A     S     T     E     R (x)

by the “Manic Street Preachers”

Sleep cannot hide thoughts splitting through my mind,
Shadows aren’t clean, false mirrors too many people awake,
If you stand up like a nail then you will be knocked down,
I’ve been too honest with myself I should have lied like everybody else.

summary: —and confine him to an ice cell, he might have said. A day or ten cramped up inside the ice would leave him shivering and...
caption:
—and confine him to an ice cell, he might have said. A day or ten cramped up inside the ice would leave him shivering and feverish and begging for release, Jon did not doubt. And the moment he is out, he and Thorne will begin to plot again.

—and tie him to his horse, he might have said. If Slynt did not wish to go to Greyguard as its commander, he could go as its cook. It will only be a matter of time until he deserts, then. And how many others will he take with him?“

—and hang him,” Jon finished.

A Dance with Dragons - Jon II

A Dance with Dragons - Jon II

—and hang him,” Jon finished.

A Dance with Dragons - Jon II

caption:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Game of Thrones (TV)
Rating: General Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Jon Snow/Sansa Stark
Characters: Sansa Stark, Jon Snow
Additional Tags: Light Angst, Drabble, Hugs, Season 8
Summary:

When Jon looks at Sansa everything disappears.

The world is reduced only to the two of them. He can’t see anyone else around them. He doesn’t want to see anyone else. For Jon this moment belongs only to them.

summary: When pirates threaten your existence, how far would you go to fight for what you believe? For those you care about? Monarchs...
caption:
When pirates threaten your existence, how far would you go to fight for what you believe? For those you care about? Monarchs take harsh measures to contain the advance of piracy. But the measure backfires. Now, royal families watch the gruesome consequences of the actions, drowning nations in panic. Who could be the next heir to disappear?

               An appless royals/pirates pairs smut rp (a little bit of everything)

home. ~ navi. ~ characters. ~ pairs. ~ taken fcs. ~ app.

summary: so i had to write a little piece of my own based on that new teaser trailer featuring jon + sansa. i firmly believe he whispers...
body:
so i had to write a little piece of my own based on that new teaser trailer featuring jon + sansa. i firmly believe he whispers something to her and when it cuts to her looking over his shoulder, she’s looking at whoever jon’s whispering about. anyways, this is my take on that really short scene! 

He had been waiting for this moment for days.

As his feet stepped off the boat and into the snow, Jon felt at ease; finally, he was home again. Behind him, the others were gathering, Tyrion speaking to his queen in hushed undertones, perhaps offering the queen the names of those she would soon be introduced to. He could have been cursing them all, for all Jon cared, for there was nothing more important than seeing her.

The gates of Winterfell opened and Jon pushed past the guards, his dark eyes searching for any sign of her in the crowd of those gathered to welcome him home. And then he saw her- she stood, wrapped in furs, with her vibrant hair loose around her shoulders, a beacon in the cold, winter morning. She stood strong and true, every inch the Northern queen she was born to be, a small smile brightening her features as their eyes met. “Sansa…” Her name fell from his lips a moment before he could catch himself and at once he was moving towards her, opening his arms as she took a single step forward. His arms came around her, an embrace warm and strong, not unlike the one they had shared months ago when she’d found him at Castle Black. For a moment, nothing else in all of the world mattered, for a moment, he could just hold her. But then he remembered himself and he knew he had to protect her from all that was to come. “Do not trust her,” he whispered into her ear as he held on fast to the sister he’d almost lost, knowing he would never do anything to put her into danger. “Believe in me.”

Over his shoulder, Sansa’s piercing gaze flicked to the dragon queen, taking in the sight of her standing there in the snow; she was beautiful, as she’d heard she was, and Sansa thought back to what Jon had just told her. Do not trust her… Believe in me… This meant only one thing; that Jon already had a plan. And so she embraced him back, holding fast to the brother she had missed these weeks since he’d gone, letting go only when he pulled back from her. And then, she stepped up to the woman who was to be called Queen of the Seven Kingdoms, and she offered her a charming sort of smile. “Welcome to Winterfell.”
body_abstract: so i had to write a little piece of my own based on that new teaser trailer featuring jon + sansa. i firmly believe he whispers something to her and when it cuts to her looking over his shoulder, she’s looking at whoever jon’s whispering about. anyways, this is my take on that really short scene!

The gates of Winterfell opened and Jon pushed past the guards, his dark eyes searching for any sign of her in the crowd of those gathered to welcome him home. And then he saw her- she stood, wrapped in furs, with her vibrant hair loose around her shoulders, a beacon in the cold, winter morning. She stood strong and true, every inch the Northern queen she was born to be, a small smile brightening her features as their eyes met. “Sansa…” Her name fell from his lips a moment before he could catch himself and at once he was moving towards her, opening his arms as she took a single step forward. His arms came around her, an embrace warm and strong, not unlike the one they had shared months ago when she’d found him at Castle Black. For a moment, nothing else in all of the world mattered, for a moment, he could just hold her. But then he remembered himself and he knew he had to protect her from all that was to come. “Do not trust her,” he whispered into her ear as he held on fast to the sister he’d almost lost, knowing he would never do anything to put her into danger. “Believe in me.”

Over his shoulder, Sansa’s piercing gaze flicked to the dragon queen, taking in the sight of her standing there in the snow; she was beautiful, as she’d heard she was, and Sansa thought back to what Jon had just told her. Do not trust her… Believe in me… This meant only one thing; that Jon already had a plan. And so she embraced him back, holding fast to the brother she had missed these weeks since he’d gone, letting go only when he pulled back from her. And then, she stepped up to the woman who was to be called Queen of the Seven Kingdoms, and she offered her a charming sort of smile. “Welcome to Winterfell.”

trail.content_raw:
so i had to write a little piece of my own based on that new teaser trailer featuring jon + sansa. i firmly believe he whispers something to her and when it cuts to her looking over his shoulder, she’s looking at whoever jon’s whispering about. anyways, this is my take on that really short scene! 

[[MORE]]

He had been waiting for this moment for days.

As his feet stepped off the boat and into the snow, Jon felt at ease; finally, he was home again. Behind him, the others were gathering, Tyrion speaking to his queen in hushed undertones, perhaps offering the queen the names of those she would soon be introduced to. He could have been cursing them all, for all Jon cared, for there was nothing more important than seeing her.

The gates of Winterfell opened and Jon pushed past the guards, his dark eyes searching for any sign of her in the crowd of those gathered to welcome him home. And then he saw her- she stood, wrapped in furs, with her vibrant hair loose around her shoulders, a beacon in the cold, winter morning. She stood strong and true, every inch the Northern queen she was born to be, a small smile brightening her features as their eyes met. “Sansa…” Her name fell from his lips a moment before he could catch himself and at once he was moving towards her, opening his arms as she took a single step forward. His arms came around her, an embrace warm and strong, not unlike the one they had shared months ago when she’d found him at Castle Black. For a moment, nothing else in all of the world mattered, for a moment, he could just hold her. But then he remembered himself and he knew he had to protect her from all that was to come. “Do not trust her,” he whispered into her ear as he held on fast to the sister he’d almost lost, knowing he would never do anything to put her into danger. “Believe in me.”

Over his shoulder, Sansa’s piercing gaze flicked to the dragon queen, taking in the sight of her standing there in the snow; she was beautiful, as she’d heard she was, and Sansa thought back to what Jon had just told her. Do not trust her… Believe in me… This meant only one thing; that Jon already had a plan. And so she embraced him back, holding fast to the brother she had missed these weeks since he’d gone, letting go only when he pulled back from her. And then, she stepped up to the woman who was to be called Queen of the Seven Kingdoms, and she offered her a charming sort of smile. “Welcome to Winterfell.”

body:
Sansa: *Tells Jon to not do what Ramsay wants him to do*

Jon: *Does What Ramsay wants him to do*

Sansa: *Tells Jon to be smarter than Robb*

Jon: *Fucks around with a woman who could possibly get himself, and those who follow him, killed*
